item.description:
Type 5, Knowledge Seeker, Workshop - also, How to Relate to 5s

Learn all about 5s and strengths and defenses. Learn about all the subtypes of 5, personal growth strategies, relationship dynamics in relationship to 5s. Fine to come if you are in relationship to a 5.

7:00 pm - 9:30 pm

(Traditional cost $40 - Sliding scale to $20)

Herb Pearce, M.Ed, is a relationship and personal life coach, with a specialty in working with personality differences and ways to communicate. He also teaches the Enneagram in organizations and companies for team building. He teaches workshops on the Myers-Briggs also, spiritual development and understanding your personal psychology.

www.herbpearce.com for complete information.
item.name: Type 5, Knowledge Seeker, Workshop - also, How to Relate to 5s
